concept.title: SFTP and Performance Measurement support for NetAct integration

section.title: SFTP configuration
section.p: SFTP is used to integrate Performance Measurement (Metrics) that are on the OAME nodes with NetAct. The MEAS mechanism requires that SFTP is configured.
This existing "spsuser" can be used with NetAct integration. By default, the password for the SFTP user is expired and must be reset by the root user. Contact Nokia Support for changing the password.

section.title: Performance measurements (Metrics) for NetAct
section.p: NetAct fetches Performance Measurement XML files from NCC using an SFTP connection on a specific interval. This interval is configured on NetAct. Performance Measurement XML files are generated by the Gen3GPPXML tool as per configuration mentioned in the configuration file:

Performance Measurement XML files are generated by the Gen3GPPXML tool every 5 minutes. This interval is configurable. The generated Performance Measurement XML files are removed when they are expired. As per the default configuration, these XML files expire and are removed after one day.
